mapper.select: select recording_idx , mb_idx , action_idx , recording_file , date_format(recording_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as recording_at from t_recording where mb_idx = 'C61A727500F311EE875C0242AC14000B' and recording_at BETWEEN DATE_ADD('2023-06-08 17:14:53',INTERVAL -6 DAY ) AND '2023-06-08 17:14:53' and recording_type = "direct_recorded"

select recording_idx , mb_idx , action_idx , recording_file , date_format(recording_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as recording_at from t_recording where mb_idx = 'C61A727500F311EE875C0242AC14000B' and recording_at like concat('%', #{date}, '%') and recording_type = "ai_generated"
